item.title: Time is money in the new sci-fi In Time
item.author: Tim Davies,
item.description: In Time Director Andrew Niccol Screenwriter Andrew Niccol Cast Justin Timberlake, Amand Seyfried The premise: humans are engineered to die at 25, beyond this age you can only live if you have “time” on your clock. How do you accrue more time? If you are one of throng of the proletariat, by working …
